com.nokia.mid.ui

Class FullCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
        • com.nokia.mid.ui.FullCanvas
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MainCanvas

    public abstract class FullCanvas
extends Canvas
    FullCanvas is an abstract class that extends Canvas and provides key constants for various key events. It also ensures that the window is set to full screen.
